sections.title: São Miguel Island: Enchanting Beginnings
sections.content: Embark on your Azores adventure on São Miguel Island, a paradise of volcanic landscapes and vibrant culture. Discover hidden gems like the serene Lagoa do Congro and the breathtaking Castelo Branco Viewpoint. Experience the thrill of a whale-watching adventure in the Atlantic, searching for majestic marine life. Explore the island's natural wonders, including the cascading waterfall of Salto do Cabrito. Enjoy the freedom of preparing intimate meals in your accommodations and relax together as you start your luxury honeymoon.

sections.title: São Miguel: Volcanic Vistas and Thermal Bliss
sections.content: Delve deeper into São Miguel's beauty with a curated tour of the island's west side, focusing on the iconic Sete Cidades twin lakes. Immerse yourselves in the geothermal wonders of the Furnas region, witnessing volcanic activity firsthand. Indulge in a delectable lunch at a renowned local restaurant, savoring authentic Azorean flavors. Unwind and rejuvenate in the therapeutic thermal pools of Terra Nostra Park, a truly unique and romantic experience. In the evening, experience the island's vibrant culture with an optional intimate dinner and a captivating Fado show.

sections.title: Madeira: Cosmopolitan Elegance and Thrilling Adventures
sections.content: Journey to the island of Madeira, a land of dramatic cliffs, lush gardens, and cosmopolitan charm. Visit iconic locations like Pico do Areeiro, Madeira's third-highest peak, offering panoramic views. Admire the dramatic coastline from the Miradouro do Guindaste viewpoint. Enjoy a traditional Madeiran dinner, experiencing the island's unique culinary heritage. For a thrilling and unforgettable experience, descend the steep streets of Funchal in a traditional wicker toboggan. Enjoy easy access to the city's sophisticated nightlife and Michelin-star restaurants, perfect for celebrating your love.

sections.title: Madeira: Coastal Hikes and Sunset Serenity
sections.content: Explore Madeira's eastern side with a private guide, uncovering hidden gems and panoramic vistas. Visit Terreiro da Luta, offering stunning views of Funchal. Immerse yourselves in the ancient beauty of the Laurissilva forest, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Embark on a scenic hike along the dramatic coastline of Ponta de São Lourenço, capturing breathtaking views. Conclude your journey with an optional romantic sunset boat tour, sailing along the coast while savoring champagne and each other's company. The final days are for relaxing, reveling in your honeymoon, and soaking in the luxurious settings.
